name: Antony's Automatic Animal Asylum
description:
It's your first day as an apprentice at Antony's Automatic Animal Asylum and you have to help to deliver the customer's orders!

Controls:

- Mouse

Click a switch to alter its direction.

Press the Start button to start the conveyor belts.

Press the reset button to reset the level.

And if you are impatient like me, choose a speed from the selector to speed things up :D
